title: 'Harmful Chemicals'
body: To my surpise, it contains harmful chemicals. I bought it assuming that it is a herbal product but the ingredient list clearly mentions some harmful chemicals being used in this shampoo.  So, if you are buying it and thinking it is a safe product, please think twice. Don't believe everything that brand says.
